Message:
There should still be
vegetation left in
Emeria’s East.
I’m sure of it.

Since getting there and back’ll
take several days,
I’ll have to leave everyone
waiting a bit longer...
But, it’s better than
not bringing anything
to them at all!

Clinging to that sliver of hope,
I wandered through
eastern towns and
Armed Force bases.

After searching far and wide...
I was able to head back to
the village in a carriage
full of food!

Everyone was
shocked at my return,
but were over
the moon to see me!

We had a grand feast that day,
just like it was a festival!

At everyone’s request,
I even played a song
on my guitar.
The villagers all cheered
along to my performance!

In the midst of the festivities,
I didn’t even notice the sad,
downcast faces among the crowd...
